title: Google's password-killer tool is now available on Chrome and Android
description: Users can now create and use passkeys on Android devices, Google confirms.

title: Netflix’s cheap, Basic with Ads streaming plan is now a reality
description: Netflix's anticipated ad-supported tier has been officially announced, with 12 countries getting the plan in November.

title: This WhatsApp Android knock-off is hijacking user accounts
description: Kaspersky uncovers two WhatsApp knockoffs stealing user data.

title: Apple is trying to make the lives of developers a whole lot easier
description: Ask Apple service looks to offer personalized support,for those creating for the App Store.

title: Intel CEO maps out next steps in grand recovery strategy
description: Pat Gelsinger has gone public with new plans to kickstart the recovery of Intel.

title: Microsoft: Companies aren't holding back on cloud spending
description: One of Microsoft's senior cloud leaders says economic threats don't seem to be dampening the demand for cloud computing.

title: Apple iCloud integration arrives in Microsoft Photos app
description: New partnership sees Microsoft and Apple opt for closer integration between the two platforms.

title: Pixel 7 users get up to five years of Google One VPN for free
description: Google One VPN is included with the Pixel 7 series at no extra costs for years after your purchase. But, is it really a no brainer?

title: Google Cloud will soon accept payment in cryptocurrency
description: Select firms will now be able to pay for Google Cloud services in a variety of different cryptocurrencies.

title: Shopify makes it easier for US ecommerce sites to manage taxes
description: Shopify now provides sales tax insights that give merchants a clear view of their current and upcoming tax calculations.

title: New Microsoft 365 app will try to do what the Office app never could
description: Microsoft 365 is getting a new look and bringing all of its apps under one roof.

title: New tricks will help Microsoft Defender for Endpoint stop malware in its tracks
description: Latest version of MDE will aim to stop malware connecting to its C2.

title: The Sony ZV-1F is a strange twist on the world’s best vlogging camera
description: Sony's new ZV-1F is a more affordable take on its original compact vlogging camera – and this time it's a tougher sell.

title: AMD RDNA 3 flagship GPU could debut in December, but may fall short of Nvidia RTX 4090
description: One leaker believes AMD’s next-gen flagship will only just sneak onto shelves before the end of the year.

title: Dyson's Gen5 Detect cordless vacuum is so powerful it can suck up viruses
description: Dyson has officially unveiled the Gen5 Detect cordless vacuum, its most powerful model ever.

title: Incognito Mode's name is wrong, and even Google employees know it
description: Even Google employees knew that Incognito Mode's name was making people believe it was more private than it really is.

title: This Microsoft Outlook update finally brings emails into the 21st century
description: Microsoft Outlook users will very soon be able to react to messages, hopefully eliminating the dreaded ‘reply to all’ chain.

title: DDoS is fast becoming a potent weapon for cybercriminals
description: Telecoms, entertainment, and fintech industries were the worst hit, due to Covid-19 and the Russian invasion.

description: Stay safe from security worries this month with some top tips.

description: PS Plus's October game catalog lineup has a healthy helping of Assassin's Creed, and a strong showing from Dragon Quest.

description: Let's break down what happened in She-Hulk's season finale and what it means for the wider MCU.

title: Oppo Find X6 Pro could take on Samsung and Apple with a huge camera sensor
description: New rumors suggest the Oppo Find X6 Pro could be in line for a one-inch rear camera sensor.

title: Microsoft announces Designer, its AI rival app to Canva and Adobe - but why?
description: Alongside announcing updated Surface products, the company has revealed how its Designer app will work with AI.

title: Nvidia benchmarks cast further doubt over RTX 4080 12GB GPU

description: Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg has confirmed that the Oculus Quest 3 will cost a lot less than the Meta Quest Pro.

description: The Fujifilm X-T5 is rumored to be launching next month – and that's great news for anyone who needs a mid-range all-rounder.

title: Roku just entered the smart home game - with a lot of help for Wyze
description: Moving beyond streaming content, Roku's Smart Home line consists of cameras, mood lighting, and more
